features: 3-Mode Wireless Mouse: The computer mouse has a three-mode connection function (one USB 2.4G and two Bluetooth). The three-mode connection can easily switch between different devices. This ergonomic mouse supports iOS/Mac OS/Android/Windows systems. In addition, this wireless mouse for laptop also comes with a new silent axis design, allowing you to use the computer mouse wireless quietly without worrying about affecting others.

4 levels of adjustable DPI: This mouse for laptop has 4 DPI resolutions, and the mouse indicator light will light up when shifting gears. They are red light (800), green light (1200), blue light (1600), and purple light (2400). You can adjust the DPI of the mouse wireless according to your needs.

Personalized Design: This rechargeable wireless mouse has a unique magnetic transparent upper cover. When the top cover is placed near the bottom of the mouse, the magnets will automatically align accurately, allowing you to smoothly fit the mouse even with your eyes closed. Through the transparent top cover, you can see the precise design of the components arranged inside the transparent body. This ambidextrous ergonomic mouse is designed for comfort and extended use. It fits perfectly into the palms of your hand, suitable for both right- or left-handed use.

Real-Time Battery Display: Our Bluetooth computer mice have a 4-bar battery display, which allows you to view the remaining battery status in real-time. You can choose whether to charge promptly based on the battery level display. Avoid worrying about how much battery the laptop mouse wireless still has. The interface used for charging is Type-C, which is safer than regular interfaces, and you can charge with confidence.

Ultra Thin Mini Portable Mouse: This three mode PC mouse is a small mouse, which is thinner and lighter than the ordinary cordless mouse. You can easily carry it anywhere, making it an excellent choice for your travel and work. The wireless magnetic mouse has a unique appearance, is easy to use, and has multiple functions, making it a good choice for giving gifts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use the 3 mode Bluetooth mouse We need to pair the mouse with the device. Turn on the power switch of the mouse, then hold down the pairing button until the mouse indicator light starts to flash. At this point, search for available devices in the Bluetooth settings of the device, locate the mouse, and pair them. After successful pairing, the mouse indicator light will stop flashing. Next, we need to set the three connection modes of the mouse. Press the mode switch button at the bottom of the mouse to switch the connection mode of the mouse. The first mode is 2.4G wireless mode, which can be connected to the computer through a USB receiver. The second and third modes are Bluetooth mode, which can be connected to Bluetooth devices. When using the mouse, we can switch between different connection modes by pressing the mode switch button. For example, when we need to switch between a computer and a phone, we can disconnect the mouse from the computer and switch to Bluetooth mode to connect to the phone. When you need to return to the computer, you can switch to 2.4G wireless mode and connect to the computer.

New Mute Axis The wireless mouse adopts a new mute axis, which produces a smaller sound when clicked than a regular mouse. Can create a quiet office environment without worrying about disturbing others. One Click Return to Desktop The 3-mode wireless mouse has a unique design that adds a return to desktop button, which can be pressed to return to the desktop with just one click. When encountering unexpected situations, it can effectively protect your privacy. Power Display This ergonomic rechargeable mouse has a battery display light that allows you to check the battery level at any time so you can decide whether to charge and stay away from battery anxiety.
